title: When I use to attach photos to texts I could get the photos from Google photo now it is changed folders to
content: I want to be able to touch the plus sign next to the text on Google message and pull up all of my photos from Google photos for some reason in the last day it has changed to selecting from the gallery where I have barely any photos why has it all of a sudden changed and I cannot figure out how to put it back the way that it was.
